item.title: Monument Valley III free DLC ‘The Garden of Life’ announced
item.content:encoded:
ustwo games has announced Monument Valley III free downloadable content “The Garden of Life.” It will launch across all platforms on December 3, alongside the game’s return to iOS and Android.

Here is an overview of the content, via ustwo games:

About

From December 3, players on mobile will once again be able to experience the signature beauty and mind-bending puzzles of Monument Valley III, including “The Garden of Life” expansion, allowing both new and returning fans to enjoy the critically acclaimed game wherever they are.

Monument Valley III has captivated critics and players alike, earning widespread praise for its ingenious puzzle design, stunning aesthetic, and evocative soundtrack. It has been nominated for multiple awards, including Best Mobile Game at the Develop:Star Awards, Game of the Year at the Pocket Gamer Mobile Game Awards, and most recently for Best Green Tech at the Playing for the Planet Awards.

The Garden of Life is a free expansion that will see players guide our heroine Noor through even more breathtaking, impossible landscapes – manipulating structures and shifting perspectives to uncover hidden paths and solve intricate puzzles.

Key Features

  • Mind-Bending New Chapters – “The Garden of Life” will add four new additional story chapters to Noor’s voyage, with some of the most inspiring and beautiful puzzles in the Monument Valley series.
  • Hidden Optional Puzzles – For the first time in the Monument Valley series, players can discover a collection of hidden bonus puzzles. Join Boatem as you journey across the floating village in search of them.
  • Return to Mobile – “The Garden of Life” will also be available on Android and iOS, as Monument Valley III makes its long awaited return to the platforms on the same day.

Monument Valley III is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam, and will return to iOS and Android on December 3.

item.title: Loulan: The Cursed Sand debut trailer, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

First look at the upcoming PlayStation China Hero Project action RPG.

ChillyRoom has released the first trailer and screenshots for Loulan: The Cursed Sand, the July 2024-announced action RPG from the PlayStation China Hero Project incubation program. It will be available for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

Loulan: The Cursed Sand is an action RPG set along the ancient Silk Road in the Western Regions of China. It tells a tragic love story of an exiled royal guard who returns to the fallen kingdom of Loulan amidst the chaos of war to find his beloved princess.

You play as the skeletal warrior known as “The Cursed Sand,” mastering the power of sand to explore and solve puzzles in a perilous top-down world. Engage in realistic melee combat against overwhelming odds, defeat powerful enemies, and confront the fate of your own cursed existence.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Cursed Warrior of Dual Forms – Control the skeletal warrior “The Cursed Sand,” freely switching between bone and sand forms to experience entirely different combat styles and story interactions.
  • Realistic Melee Combat Against Many – Engage in grounded, one-against-many melee battles from a dynamic top-down perspective, where terrain design, enemy composition, and combat mechanics intertwine to test your skill and strategy.
  • Diverse and Creative Sand Abilities – Learn and wield unique sand abilities to solve puzzles, explore intricate levels, and experiment with multiple combat styles and tactical approaches.
  • Formidable Elites and Bosses – Face thrilling one-on-one encounters with powerful elite enemies and colossal bosses that challenge your mastery and reflexes.
  • Ancient Western Fantasy World – Explore a mysterious world inspired by the lost Kingdom of Loulan along the Silk Road, featuring diverse regions and atmospheric, handcrafted levels.
